name: Chuck & Bull
description:
Chuck & Bull farming game!  2020 Demo.

Use the keyboard or a game controller to control Chuck, our humble farmer.  Drive the tractor, attach farming implements, and grow your crops.

Experiment with different tools to get the best yield.

Sign up for our mailing list at https://chuckandbull.com

Join our discord server at https://discord.gg/rMAsVc

Or follow us at https://twitter.com/snowflakestudio

We need your feedback to improve the game! So please leave us your thoughts below.  You can also contact us at contact@chuckandbull.com

NOTE: This game is not being actively developed. This was a closed demo that we released in early 2020.  We've put development on the game on indefinite hiatus.   It's simply too large in scope for us now.  But we think what we put together is pretty neat and hope those who didn't get a chance to play the closed demo enjoy it.
